name: Circle Of Potters
description:
It's the battle of the century. The wizards have gathered atop Hogwarts Castle. They have formed a giant circle. Demonic ritual? Nay... It's the

Circle. Of, Potter!!!

Featuring

-Harry Potter vs. Lord Voldemort vs. Hermione Granger vs. Ron Weasely vs. like 10 other Potters all at once! 

-Fully Voiced!

-Way too much RNG!

"The **** is this?!" -GameInformer

"I don't really get it" -IGN

"Turn-Based Combat at it's Finest" - Nobody
